description: Unsigned; geometrically rendered still life; pink rose in a white vase in center; yellow lemon in ULQ; black bottle with gray stripes on left edge; blue and black geometric background; black bottle with thin gray stripes in URC; rust colored band of pigment across bottom
inscription: LLC, in pencil: ばらと瓶 {Bara to bin} | bottom center, in pencil: 8/120 | LRC, in pencil: 1974
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Rose and Bottle
